HugsLib.UpdateFeatureDef.content: - You can now adjust or disable various features for Hospitality in the mod settings menu, including the new feature that happy guests help you with work.
- Various fixes (see mod page)|- New option to forbid guests from working on workbenches|Wanna do me a personal favor? Then please click the link above for more information.

- Updated to "0.19"|- Guests will now equip what they buy|- There is now a hefty penalty when noone from a group returns|- Various bug fixes|Wanna do me a personal favor? Then please click the link above for more information.
